name: Cybernetic Eye
description: Very common and useful modification. Perfect vision that won't fade with age. Includes camera function (500 stills or 100 seconds video). Easy to detect as they're standard blue/brown/grey shades.

name: Cybernetic Eye - Colour Enhancement
description: Allows computer-enhanced colour or black and white vision. DM+1 to Recon checks spotting camouflage.

name: Cybernetic Eye - Data Display
description: Adds AR rig capabilities to cybernetic eyes through programming.

name: Cybernetic Eye - Flash Proof
description: Protects from sudden light flares like photosensitive goggles.

name: Cybernetic Eye - Low Light
description: Light-intensification for low-light environments.

name: Cybernetic Eye - Subtlety
description: Makes it nearly impossible to detect as cybernetic. Requires Very Difficult (12+) Medic or Formidable (14+) Investigate check.

name: Cybernetic Eye - Telescopic Vision
description: 40x binocular equivalent for superior long-range vision.

name: Cybernetic Eye - Thermal Imaging
description: Thermally-sensitive imaging for temperature gradient vision without visible light.

name: Cybernetic Ear
description: Uncommon modification. Grants Heightened Senses trait for hearing. Can record sound for playback.

name: Cybernetic Ear - High-Frequency Acoustic Sensor
description: Hear sounds above human range. Not natural appearance. DM+2 to Recon/Investigate checks involving high-frequency sound.

name: Cybernetic Ear - Low-Frequency Acoustic Sensor
description: Hear sounds below human range. Not natural appearance. DM+2 to Recon/Investigate checks involving low-frequency sound.

name: Cybernetic Arm
description: Most common artificial limb replacement. STR 7 base, upgradeable to STR 16. Includes power supply for 96 hours continuous use.

name: Cybernetic Arm - Strength Enhancement
description: Each point of STR improvement above first costs additional Lv1000.

name: Cybernetic Hand
description: Advanced manipulation unit. Can be equipped with tools or weapons.

name: Cybernetic Leg
description: Allows walking/running over long distances. Grants alternative END for distance travel. STR 7 base to END 7, upgradeable to END 16.

name: Cybernetic Leg - Endurance Enhancement
description: Each point of END improvement above first costs additional Lv600.

name: Cybernetic Foot
description: Replacement foot unit for prosthetic use or enhancement.

name: Cyberlimb Battery
description: Compact super-battery. Supplies power for up to 96 hours continuous use. Can be quickly replaced.

name: Cyberlimb Armour
description: Additional armour installation on limbs. Max additional Protection of TL-6. Cost per Protection point.

name: Neural Jack
description: Electronic socket wired to brain through neural bridge. Allows thought control of equipment. Inputs without body interference.

name: Neural Bridge
description: Latest neural interface technology. Enables mental control and direct neural linking to equipment.

name: Neural Sheathing
description: Protective neural implant for enhanced neural interface reliability.

name: HyperCharger
description: Stores endorphins for surge usage. Grants Fast Metabolism (+1) trait. Can store up to four surges for Tough (+2).

name: Combat Implant
description: Manchurian development from Central Asian War. Stimulates endorphin production. Grants Fast Metabolism (+1) and Tough (+2) with surges.

name: Muscle Implant
description: Genetic tailoring and viral administration for muscle enhancement. Can increase DEX up to +3.

name: Augmented Reality Rig
description: Overlays computer-generated images and data in user's field of view. Can display sensor data from PAN or act as targeting system.

name: Subdermacomp
description: Similar to portacomp (computer/3) with Link connection. No plug-in chips but special reader for induction link programming.

name: Transdermal Link
description: Implanted Link phone with external access ports. Typically linked to AR rig or VID for input. Can splice into neural jack.

name: Subdermatalk
description: Small 15km radio implanted behind ear with microphone alongside larynx. Sub-vocalization possible.

name: Skinwatch
description: Multifunction mini-comp on forearm. Monitors heartrate, blood pressure, temperature, oxygen. Powered by body heat.

name: PAN Controller
description: Personal Area Network controller. Small device implanted below skin for short-range networking.

name: RFID Chip
description: Core world standard. Provides secure access for homes, cars, bank accounts. Also enables tracking. Installed with hypodermic.

name: Growler
description: Allows Traveller to duplicate low notes used in Eber speech. Only useful with that alien species.

name: Hand Razors
description: Short carboglass blades implanted in hands. Retract under fingernails. Hard to spot but can be broken.

name: Wrist Blades
description: Larger than razors. Ceramic blades implanted in forearm sheath. Hidden but detectable on close examination.
